meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Martin Powell Susan Petracco Betsy Chisolm Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6462.

td.p: Martin Powell, a chemical engineer from Bowie, Maryland
Susan Petracco, an e-commerce consultant from Viera, Florida
Betsy Chisolm, a volunteer storyteller from Greeley, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,199)

tr.td: THE ENGLISH BEAT
LITERARY HOUSES
SEND ME A TEXT
THE HUDSON RIVER
SHRINK RAP
(Alex: And then, in honor of the James Beard Foundation...)
BEARD AWARD-WINNING CHEFS

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Betsy
Susan
Martin
THE ENGLISH BEAT
(Alex: But this'll be a little different than the one we had in the first round.)
TRUNK SHOW
INKS & DYES
WHO "R-U"?
(Alex: Those two letters will begin each correct response.)
THE DREADED OPERA CATEGORY
WORDS IN U.S. CAPITALS
(Alex: The correct response will be a word that is found in one of our U.S. capitals, in order.)
